plot: Yoshiko Aoi is a biology researcher at a Japanese university when her ex-lover, the flashy, popular, and completely over the top professor Takashi Minamihara bursts back into her nerdy life.
plot_en: Yoshiko Aoi is a biology researcher at a Japanese university when her ex-lover, the flashy, popular, and completely over the top professor Takashi Minamihara bursts back into her nerdy life.
plot_es: Yoshiko Aoi is a biology researcher at a Japanese university when her ex-lover, the flashy, popular, and completely over the top professor Takashi Minamihara bursts back into her nerdy life.
title: Fukigen na jiin
